Extracted Data.Name: SURESH M
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: Experienced professional with 7 years and 6 months of expertise, including 2 years as a Junior Planning Engineer and 5 years and 6 months as an MIS Analyst. Adept at data analysis, reporting automation, and business intelligence. Proficient in Advanced Excel with macros (VBA) for process automation, SQL for data extraction and transformation, and Power BI for creating dynamic dashboards. Experienced in using SAP for operational reporting and ensuring data accuracy across departments. Demonstrated ability to streamline reporting processes, uncover actionable insights, and support data driven business decisions across both planning and MIS functions.

Experience.Title: MIS Analyst
Experience.Description: Demonstrated strong analytical leadership by driving automation and data accuracy across nationwide reporting systems, leading to a 60% reduction in manual workload and significantly improving decision making speed through the deployment of Power BI dashboards and advanced Excel solutions. Handled and maintained reporting for 15+ active client datasets, ensuring accuracy, confidentiality, and timely delivery of insights to stakeholders. Successfully managed daily, weekly, and monthly reports for operations and business performance using advanced Excel techniques Continuously worked to improve and optimize reporting processes, reducing manual work and increasing productivity. Recognized for data accuracy and on time delivery, supporting 100% SLA compliance on reporting deliverables.

Experience.Title: MIS ANALYST
Experience.Description: Managing day to day inventory management. Analytics month data. Sharing reports on time. Manpower Co ordination, Monitoring S & G, Monitoring Pack size Follow ups, Inventory Reports, Shortfall reports, EOD Records, Tracker Maintenance all are done daily.

Experience.Title: Junior Planning Engineer
Experience.Description: Worked in the Materials Planning Department supporting project execution and inventory management using SAP ERP. Handled MBOM (Manufacturing Bill of Materials) verification and ensured accurate material planning for final production stages. Assisted in preparing planning schedules and aligning material availability with project timelines

Education: Diploma in Electronics and Communication Engineering - muthayammal polytechnic institute
BBA in Business Administration - Alagappa Univercity
Class XII - govt Hr Sec School

Recommendations: Add specific quantifiable achievements for each role to demonstrate the impact you made; use metrics to showcase results. For example, instead of saying 'Improved reporting processes', quantify it as 'Improved reporting processes, resulting in a **15% reduction in processing time**'.

Incorporate relevant **projects** (even personal ones) to show practical application of your skills, detailing the objectives, your role, and the outcomes; this will highlight your abilities beyond just work experience.

Include relevant **certifications** to demonstrate your commitment to continuous learning and expertise in specific areas, such as project management or data analysis; this adds credibility to your skill set.

Tailor your **summary** to align with the specific job you are applying for, highlighting the most relevant skills and experiences; this will increase the chances of capturing the recruiter's attention.
Ensure consistent **formatting** throughout the resume, using clear headings and bullet points, which is crucial for readability and makes it easier for ATS to parse the information correctly.
Proofread carefully to eliminate any **spelling or grammar errors**, which can detract from your professionalism and credibility; use tools like Grammarly to help with this.
Quantify the **accomplishments** listed under each role to demonstrate the value you brought to the organization, use metrics and data to highlight your achievements and results.

RESUME_TIPS: Quantify the impact of your **Power BI** dashboards by including metrics such as **increased sales conversion rates** or **improved inventory turnover**. Add this to your MIS Analyst experience to demonstrate tangible results.

In your accomplishments, highlight your experience with **demand forecasting** techniques. Even if you haven't formally used them, demonstrate how your data analysis contributed to anticipating inventory needs, which aligns with the **inventory planning** responsibilities.

Mention experience in **inventory optimization**, specifically detailing how you identified and proposed actions for slow-moving or overstocked items. This aligns with the job's focus on improving **inventory turnover** and reducing **stock outs**.

In your skills section, include specific keywords related to **inventory replenishment** and **allocation strategies**. Reference any experience in defining **min/max levels** or managing **stock movement** between locations.

Elaborate on your experience with **Excel**, detailing your proficiency with advanced functions and add-ins relevant to inventory analysis. Mention specific techniques like **ABC classification** you've used to optimize inventory.

While you mention **SQL**, specify its application in **inventory**-related tasks such as **stock level analysis** or **demand forecasting**. This helps to directly tie your SQL skills to the job's core requirements.

In your experience, include examples of your ability to **collaborate with merchandising and sales teams** to adjust forecasts for new launches and promotions. This demonstrates cross-functional communication, a key skill required.

Add any exposure you have to **ERP systems** like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce** under Skills. If you used **SAP** for inventory tasks, describe how it aligns with the responsibilities mentioned in the job description.

Showcase your ability to build and maintain dashboards for **inventory health** and **forecast accuracy**. Quantify improvements such as **reducing stockouts by X%** using those dashboards in the MIS Analyst section.

Expand on your experience managing data for multiple clients by highlighting how you tailored reports to their specific needs and improved decision-making. Connect this to the ability to handle varied **SKU** data.

Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Learn fundamental concepts and statistical methods for demand forecasting, including time series analysis and regression models.
Gain hands-on experience using forecasting techniques in the retail industry, including sales forecasting and inventory planning.
A free course using Python to build and evaluate time series models for demand forecasting and trend analysis.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Understand core principles of inventory management including ABC analysis and its application to optimizing inventory control.
Learn the fundamentals of inventory management, including techniques like ABC analysis for efficient stock control.
A video tutorial explaining the concepts and applications of ABC analysis in inventory management.

EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to apply analytical techniques, including EOQ, to optimize supply chain processes and inventory levels.

EOQ.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Control: EOQ and Reorder Point
EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Master the EOQ model and reorder point calculations to minimize inventory costs and avoid stockouts.
Explanation and calculation of the Economic Order Quantity (EOQ) model for inventory management.

ERP systems.DESCRIPTION: Understand the foundational concepts of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems and their role in business operations.
A comprehensive guide covering the different aspects of ERP systems, from implementation to daily use.
Introductory video explaining what ERP systems are and how they help businesses manage resources.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: A practical course on using NetSuite for business operations, covering key modules and functionalities.
Learn the essential aspects of NetSuite, from setting up your account to using key features.
Collection of tutorials covering different aspects of NetSuite functionality and usage.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive course covering how to manage inventory using Zoho Inventory, including setup, configuration, and best practices.
Learn how to leverage Zoho CRM for managing customer relationships and improving business processes.
Free video tutorials covering various Zoho apps and their features for business management.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Understand the process of e-commerce fulfillment and third-party logistics (3PL).
Discover inventory management processes for retailers and understand the importance of forecasting demand
Explains how inventory management software can help your company.
